sen.j: 新撰莬玖波集（しんせんつくばしゅう）は、室町時代後期の准勅撰連歌撰集。
sen.e: Shinsen Tsukuba Shu is a Junchokusenrengasenshu (anthology of renga) in the late Muromachi era.
Shinsen Tsukuba Shu is a Junchokusenrengasenshu (anthology of renga) in the late Muromachi era.
Shinsen Tsukuba Shu is a Jun chokusen renga senshu (anthology of renga) in the late Muromachi era.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。

sen.e: The number of poems is about 2000.
The number of poems is about 2000.
The number of poems is about 2000.

sen.j: 大内政弘の発願により、宗祇を中心として、猪苗代兼載・宗長・肖柏らの協力により撰集され、1495年（明応4年）に成立した。
sen.e: The anthology was compiled at the wish of Masahiro OUCHI by Sogi, who was helped by Kensai INAWASHIRO, Socho, Shohaku, and others, in 1495.
The anthology was compiled at the wish of Masahiro OUCHI by Sogi, who was helped by Kensai INAWASHIRO, Socho, Shohaku, and others, in 1495.
The anthology was compiled at the wish of Masahiro OUCHI by Sogi, who was helped by Kensai INAWASHIRO, Socho, Shohaku, and others, in 1495.

sen.j: 心敬・宗砌・後土御門天皇・専順・大内政弘など約250人の句を集めた有心連歌の集大成である。
sen.e: It is a compilation of Ushin renga (elegant, subtle and profound works) created by about 250 poets including Shinkei, Sozei, Emperor Gotsuchimikado, Senjun, and Masahiro OUCHI,
It is a compilation of Ushin renga (elegant, subtle and profound works) created by about 250 poets including Shinkei, Sozei, Emperor Gotsuchimikado, Senjun, and Masahiro OUCHI.
It is a compilation of Ushin renga (elegant, subtle and profound works) created by about 250 poets including Shinkei, Sozei, Emperor Gotsuchimikado, Senjun, and Masahiro OUCHI.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
